result.reason: The LoadLayout method clears existing panels before loading from XML; if deserialization fails, the application is left with an empty interface. Wrapping the load operation in a try-catch block to restore the default layout upon failure will resolve this.
result.approach: Wrap the logic in LoadLayout with a try-catch block. In the catch block, log the exception and call _mainForm.SetDefaultLayout() to ensure the UI remains usable.
